import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Add Guide"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/games/{game-id}/guides"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Add a guide for a game. Successful request will return a single [Guide Object](/restapi/docs/schemas/guide-object).



:::tip

Rules engine applies here

:::

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"game-id","in":"path","description":"Game ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":1}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"multipart/form-data":{"schema":{"title":"Add Guide Request","properties":{"name":{"description":"Guide name, required, max length of 70 characters, no links, trimmed, cleaned for XSS.","type":"string","maxLength":70,"example":"Modding Guide for Rogue Knight"},"summary":{"description":"Summary with a length between 20 and 250 characters, no links, trimmed, cleaned for XSS.","type":"string","maxLength":250,"minLength":20,"example":"Short descriptive summary here"},"description":{"description":"Description with max length of 150,000 characters, cleaned for XSS, trimmed, and converted HTTP to HTTPS.","type":"string","maxLength":150000,"example":"<h2>Getting started with.."},"logo":{"description":"Required image with valid JPG, JPEG, or PNG formats, max size of 8MB, minimum dimensions of 512x288, and valid EXIF headers.","type":"string","format":"binary"},"date_live":{"description":"Date when the guide goes live, must be a positive integer.","type":"integer","format":"int32","minimum":0,"example":1626667557},"status":{"title":"Guide Permission Enum","description":"Status of the guide, see [status and visibility](/restapi/status-and-visibility) for details).","type":"integer","enum":[0,1,3],"example":"1","x-enumDescriptions":{"NOT_ACCEPTED (0)":"Not accepted.","ACCEPTED (1)":"Accepted and live.","DELETED (3)":"Deleted."}},"community_options":{"title":"Guide Community Options Enum","description":"The bitwise community options that are applied to this guide, allowing or disabling guide comments. Can be one of","type":"integer","enum":[0,2048],"example":"2048","x-enumDescriptions":{"DISABLED (0)":"Disabled","ALLOWS_COMMENTS (2048)":"Allows comments (default)"}},"tags":{"type":"array","items":{"description":"Tags for the guide, required and must be distinct.","type":"string","maxLength":30},"maxItems":7},"name_id":{"description":"Name ID with alphanumeric dashes, maximum length based on configuration, and must be unique.","type":"string"}},"type":"object"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"201":{"description":"Created","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Guide Object","description":"Contains Guide data.","properties":{"id":{"description":"Unique id of the guide.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1209},"game_id":{"description":"Unique id of the parent game.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":3},"game_name":{"description":"Name of the parent game.","type":"string","example":"My Awesome Game"},"logo":{"title":"Logo Object","description":"Contains logo data.","properties":{"filename":{"description":"Logo filename including extension.","type":"string","example":"card.png"},"original":{"description":"URL to the full-sized logo.","type":"string","example":"https://assets.modcdn.io/images/placeholder/card.png"},"thumb_320x180":{"description":"URL to the small logo thumbnail.","type":"string","example":"https://assets.modcdn.io/images/placeholder/card.png"},"thumb_640x360":{"description":"URL to the medium logo thumbnail.","type":"string","example":"https://assets.modcdn.io/images/placeholder/card.png"},"thumb_1280x720":{"description":"URL to the large logo thumbnail.","type":"string","example":"https://assets.modcdn.io/images/placeholder/card.png"}},"type":"object"},"user":{"title":"User Object","description":"Contains user data.","properties":{"id":{"description":"Unique id of the user.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1},"name_id":{"description":"Path for the user on mod.io. Value will be `null` if no valid `X-Modio-Portal` portal header value is provided. For more information see [Targeting a Portal](/restapi/platforms#targeting-a-portal).","type":"string","example":null},"date_online":{"description":"Unix timestamp of date the user was last online.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1509922961},"date_joined":{"description":"Unix timestamp of date the user joined.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1509922961},"avatar":{"title":"Avatar Object","description":"Contains avatar data.","properties":{"filename":{"description":"Avatar filename including extension.","type":"string","example":"avatar.png"},"original":{"description":"URL to the full-sized avatar.","type":"string","example":"https://assets.modcdn.io/images/placeholder/avatar.png"},"thumb_50x50":{"description":"URL to the small avatar thumbnail.","type":"string","example":"https://assets.modcdn.io/images/placeholder/avatar_50x50.png"},"thumb_100x100":{"description":"URL to the medium avatar thumbnail.","type":"string","example":"https://assets.modcdn.io/images/placeholder/avatar_100x100.png"}},"type":"object"},"timezone":{"description":"Deprecated: No longer used and will be removed in subsequent API version.","type":"string","example":""},"language":{"description":"Deprecated: No longer used and will be removed in subsequent API version. To [localize the API response](/restapi/docs/localization) we recommend you set the `Accept-Language` header.","type":"string","example":""},"profile_url":{"description":"URL to the users profile.","type":"string","example":"https://mod.io/u/xant"}},"type":"object"},"date_added":{"description":"Unix timestamp of the date the guide was made.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1509922961},"date_updated":{"description":"Unix timestamp of the date the guide was updated.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1509922961},"date_live":{"description":"Unix timestamp of the date the guide was set live.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1509922961},"status":{"title":"Guide Permission Enum","description":"Status of the guide, see [status and visibility](/restapi/status-and-visibility) for details).","type":"integer","enum":[0,1,3],"example":"1","x-enumDescriptions":{"NOT_ACCEPTED (0)":"Not accepted.","ACCEPTED (1)":"Accepted and live.","DELETED (3)":"Deleted."}},"url":{"description":"URL to the guide.","type":"string","example":"https://mod.io/g/rogue-knight/r/getting-started"},"name":{"description":"The name of the guide","type":"string","example":"Getting Started"},"name_id":{"description":"Path for the guide on mod.io. For example: https://mod.io/g/rogue-knight/r/__getting-started__","type":"string","example":"getting-started"},"summary":{"description":"The summary of the guide","type":"string","example":"Alright, so let's get started with modding on mod.io"},"description":{"description":"Detailed description of the guide (the contents) which allows HTML.","type":"string","example":"<h1>Getting Started</h2><p>Download this suspiciou...."},"community_options":{"title":"Guide Community Options Enum","description":"The bitwise community options that are applied to this guide, allowing or disabling guide comments. Can be one of","type":"integer","enum":[0,2048],"example":"2048","x-enumDescriptions":{"DISABLED (0)":"Disabled","ALLOWS_COMMENTS (2048)":"Allows comments (default)"}},"tags":{"description":"Contains guide tag data.","type":"array","items":{"title":"Guide Tag Object","description":"Contains guide tag data.","properties":{"name":{"description":"Tag name.","type":"string","example":"Instructions"},"date_added":{"description":"Unix timestamp of date tag was applied.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1499841487},"count":{"description":"The amount of times this tag has been applied to guides. This value will only be returned for the Get Guide Tags endpoint.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":22}},"type":"object"}},"stats":{"description":"Contains stats data.","type":"array","items":{"title":"Guide Stats Object","description":"Contains stats data.","properties":{"guide_id":{"description":"Unique guide id.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":2},"visits_today":{"description":"Last 24hours of visits for this guide","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":0},"visits_total":{"description":"Total number of visits for this guide","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":0},"comments_total":{"description":"Total number of comments for this guide","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":0}},"type":"object"}}},"type":"object"}}}},"403":{"description":"The authenticated user does not have permission to add guides to this game. Ensure the user is part of the game team before attempting the request again.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Error Object","description":"Standard API error response.","properties":{"error":{"description":"Contains error data.","properties":{"code":{"description":"The [HTTP code](/restapi/introduction#response-codes).","type":"integer","format":"int32","default":403},"error_ref":{"description":"The mod.io error code.","type":"integer","default":10000},"message":{"description":"The server response to your request. Responses will vary depending on the endpoint, but the object structure will persist.","type":"string","default":"You do not have the required permissions to access this resource."},"errors":{"description":"Optional Validation errors object. This field is only supplied if the response is a validation error `422 Unprocessible Entity`. See [errors documentation](/restapi/errors) for more information.","type":"object"}},"type":"object"}},"type":"object"}}},"x-errorrefs":{"14027":"The authenticated user does not have permission to add guides to this game. Ensure the user is part of the game team before attempting the request again."}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
